Items.Name: Athanor
Attributes: Reload your Potions 1 Ammo and Charge them 1 second(s).
At the start of each day, get a Small Potion item.

Enchantments.Name: Shielded
Enchantments.Effect: Shield equal to 10 times this item's Burn.

Enchantments.Name: Restorative
Enchantments.Effect: Heal equal to 10 times this item's Burn.

Enchantments.Name: Toxic
Enchantments.Effect: Poison equal to this item's Burn.

Enchantments.Name: Radiant
Enchantments.Effect: This cannot be Frozen, Slowed or Destroyed.

Enchantments.Name: Obsidian
Enchantments.Effect: Deal Damage equal to 10 times this item's Burn.
